title: BRIEF-Lectra says German Supreme Court rules against local competitor for patent infringement
text:
BRIEF-Lectra says German Supreme Court rules against local competitor for patent infringement 
Oct 6 Lectra SA : 
* Says German Supreme Court in Dusseldorf rules against local competitor for patent infringement Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom:) Trending On Reuters
